unnormalised: Someone asked me what's so special about certain dates in Indian history. Well, there are quite a few! Obviously, 15/08/1947 is huge – that's our Independence Day! Feels like ages ago, right? But it’s the day we finally got free from British rule. There were tons of celebrations all over the country. My grandma always tells stories about how everyone was distributing sweets and singing patriotic songs.

unnormalised: Then there's 26/01/1950, Republic Day. This is when our Constitution came into effect. Before that, we were kinda running things based on some old British laws. unnormalised: Don't forget 02/10, which is Gandhi Jayanti. That's Mahatma Gandhi's birthday! He's considered the father of the nation, you know? He played a huge role in getting us independence.
